vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
CErc20DelegateCertora.otherToken (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2955-2957) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- liquidateBorrowFreshPub (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2975-2979)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1152-1214) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1178)
	-transferFrom (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1192)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._addReservesInternal (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2435-2447):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2436-2437)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2443-2444)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._reduceReserves (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2498-2508):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2499-2500)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2505-2506)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setComptroller (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2367-2386):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2375-2376)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2378-2379)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModel (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2563-2573):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2564-2565)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2570-2571)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2570-2571)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2579-2609):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newInterestRateModel.isInterestRateModel(),marker method returned false) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2598-2600)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2601-2603)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setReserveFactor (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2391-2401):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2392-2393)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reserveFactorMantissa (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2398-2399)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.accrueInterest (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1599-1677):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1616)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1668)
	- borrowIndex (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1669)
	- totalBorrows (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1670)
	- totalReserves (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1671)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.borrowInternal (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1929-1937):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1930)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1936)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1936)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CErc20Immutable.constructor (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2909-2928):
	External calls:
	- initialize(underlying_,comptroller_,interestRateModel_,initialExchangeRateMantissa_,name_,symbol_,decimals_) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2921-2923)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- admin (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2924-2925)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.initialize (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1241-1272):
	External calls:
	- err = _setComptroller(comptroller_) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1255)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1259)
	- borrowIndex (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1260)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.liquidateBorrowInternal (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2141-2156):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2142)
	- error = cTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2148)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,cTokenCollateral) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2155)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2155)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.redeemFresh (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1828-1922):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.redeemAllowed(address(this),redeemer,vars.redeemTokens) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1868)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1911)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.repayBorrowBehalfInternal (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2037-2045):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2038)
	- repayBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2044)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2044)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.repayBorrowInternal (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2021-2029):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2022)
	- repayBorrowFresh(msg.sender,msg.sender,repayAmount) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2028)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2028)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
CErc20.initialize (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2665-2680) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-EIP20Interface(underlying).totalSupply() (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2677-2678)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (MathError err, Exp memory fraction) = divScalarByExp(scalar, divisor);
vulnerability_findings.message:
Exponential.divScalarByExpTruncate.fraction (local variable @ CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#859) shadows:
	- Exponential.fraction (function @ CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1073-1075)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function redeemFreshPub(address payable redeemer, uint redeemTokens, uint redeemUnderlying) public returns (uint) {
vulnerability_findings.message:
CErc20DelegateCertora.redeemFreshPub.redeemUnderlying (local variable @ CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2962) shadows:
	- CErc20.redeemUnderlying (function @ CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2709-2713)
	- CErc20Interface.redeemUnderlying (function @ CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#363)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.borrowFresh (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1951-2014):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.borrowAllowed(address(this),borrower,borrowAmount) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1953)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountBorrows (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2003)
	- accountBorrows (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2004)
	- totalBorrows (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2005)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.initialize (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1241-1272):
	External calls:
	- err = _setComptroller(comptroller_) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1255)
	- err = _setInterestRateModelFresh(interestRateModel_) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1263)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _notEntered (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1271)
	- decimals (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1268)
	- name (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1266)
	- symbol (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1267)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CErc20.initialize (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2665-2680):
	External calls:
	- super.initialize(comptroller_,interestRateModel_,initialExchangeRateMantissa_,name_,symbol_,decimals_) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2673-2675)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- underlying (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#2676-2677)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.mintFresh (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1712-1776):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.mintAllowed(address(this),minter,mintAmount) (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1714)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountTokens (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1766)
	- totalSupply (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1765)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.redeemFresh (CErc20DelegateCertora.sol#1828-1922):
